original_text: And some of them were persuaded and joined Paul and Silas, as did a great many of the devout Greeks and not a few of the leading women.
korean_text: 그 중의 어떤 사람 곧 경건한 헬라인의 큰 무리와 적지 않은 귀부인도 권함을 받고 바울과 실라를 따르나

sentences.original_text: And some of them were persuaded
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 어떤 이들은 설득을 받았고

sentences.original_text: as did a great many of the devout Greeks
and not a few of the leading women.
